job.title: Delivery Driver
job.description:
Qualifications
  1. Minimum age of 21
  2. Valid U.S. driver’s license
  3. Smartphone with navigation capability
  4. Reliable personal vehicle (van or truck not required)
  5. Strong communication and problem-solving skills
  6. Excellent attention to detail and ability to follow directions

If onboarded, you must provide your own delivery equipment, including catering bags (23x13x15) and a collapsible cart, wagon, or hand truck. These items are required to meet client standards.

Responsibilities
  1. Pick up and deliver food or other items promptly and professionally
  2. Transport orders safely and maintain quality during delivery
  3. Set up orders at customer locations when requested (light setup only)
  4. Accept deliveries across a range of pay levels
  5. Represent The RedWagon Delivers with professionalism in appearance and attitude
  6. Maintain exceptional customer service standards on every delivery
Work schedule
  1. Monday to Friday
  2. Weekend availability
Supplemental pay
  1. Other
Benefits
  1. Flexible schedule

job.title: Pharmaceutical Delivery Driver
job.description:
MMS Courier clients expect professionalism, transparency, accuracy, and agility from us. So our courier partners drive fuel-efficient, reliable vehicles and take operating their own businesses very seriously. Listed below are a few of the requirements you must meet to join our team:

  1. Must have a valid drivers’ license and exemplary driving record.
  2. Drive a clean, well-maintained, insured vehicle.
  3. Successfully pass a background check and drug test.
  4. Secure 100/300 commercial insurance.
  5. Have a current EIN number with the IRS.
  6. Undergo OSHA, IATA and HIPAA training, as well as the proper handling and transport of ambient, refrigerated and frozen specimens.
  7. Be a high school graduate.
  8. Have a name badge with photo.

If our business model and commitment to exceptional service align with your career goals and objectives, let us know by clicking on the GigSafe icon and get the partnership process started. We look forward to learning more about you and how MMS Courier can help you achieve your goals.

job.title: Delivery Driver
job.description:
"The RedWagon Delivers is seeking reliable, motivated independent contractors to join our delivery team. Our ideal candidate has experience with platforms such as DoorDash, Grubhub, or Uber Eats, and understands how partnering with RedWagon can increase overall earnings. As a 1099 contractor, you will manage your own schedule and operate as an independent business partner.


Deliveries typically take 30 minutes and are most frequent between 9 AM and 2 PM, though routes are available from 6 AM to 9 PM, seven days a week. Your availability directly determines your earning potential. Compensation is per delivery, not hourly. Top earners regularly make between $50 and $200+ per day.


Qualifications:

- Minimum age of 21

- Valid U.S. driverâ€™s license

- Smartphone with navigation capability

- Reliable personal vehicle (van or truck not required)

- Strong communication and problem-solving skills

- Excellent attention to detail and ability to follow directions

- If onboarded, you must provide your own delivery equipment, including catering bags (23x13x15) and a collapsible cart, wagon, or hand truck. These items are required to meet client standards.


Responsibilities:

- Pick up and deliver food or other items promptly and professionally

- Transport orders safely and maintain quality during delivery

- Set up orders at customer locations when requested (light setup only)

- Accept deliveries across a range of pay levels

- Represent The RedWagon Delivers with professionalism in appearance and attitude

- Maintain exceptional customer service standards on every delivery

- Work schedule

- Monday to Friday

- Weekend availability

- Supplemental pay
